name: Terminal Resume
oneLiner: Browser-based terminal emulator showcasing an interactive CLI-driven portfolio.
description: Built a fully interactive terminal interface replicating real shell behavior with structured command parsing, execution context, async output streaming, and session persistence.
highlights: Registry-based command architecture with strict separation of data and logic
Unified async output engine with streaming text and theme-aware rendering
Autocomplete, history navigation, typo suggestions, limited flags, and man pages
Grounded AI-powered 'ask' command using constrained prompting

name: HireSight
oneLiner: AI-powered SaaS platform for resume scoring, job matching, and interview simulation.
description: Developed a full-stack career platform with resume analysis, weighted job-skill matching, and AI-driven interview feedback.
highlights: Hybrid SQL + NoSQL architecture separating authentication from resume workflows
Stateless JWT authentication with HTTP-only cookies and Google OAuth
Admin panel for managing jobs and interview questions

name: ClerkMate
oneLiner: CLI-first productivity tool for structured standup logging with AI summaries.
description: Built a terminal-first productivity system with offline-first local storage, backend sync, and centralized dashboard.
highlights: Modular CLI architecture with command registry
AI-powered weekly summaries with fingerprint-based deduplication
Secure authentication with well-defined API contracts
